nodes.text:
A Jedi strike force was sent to Galidraan to halt the Mandalorian army in 44 BBY.
It ambushed and defeated the True Mandalorians and captured their leader, Jango Fett.

The Jedi Strike force was send to Galidraan after the Governor of Galidraan fasely informed the Jedi Council that Mandalorians were murdering "political activists". The strike force immediately ordered the Mandalorians, lead by Jango Fett, to stand down, an order refused by Fett.
A hard battle soon erupted, that left more than half of the strike force members killed and the death of all Mandalorians except their leader, who was then captured by the remaining Jedi.
